metadata.name: Dracorium #1
metadata.description:
Hold Dracoriums, earn future rewards. Every Dracorium is eligible to earn 25% of project royalties soon after mint.

Dracoriums exist on the Ethereum blockchain, every NFT is unique and serves a purpose. Holders will have the opportunity to participate in our upcoming P2E game in connection to IRL utility.

Our brand representing Dracorium has been around circa 1996, holding Dracorium NFTs solidifies your involvement and the opportunity to have a say in future decisions. Dracorium's P2E game surrounds our world class involvement in entertainment and supports the ideology behind it. The aspirations behind Dracorium encompasses our hopes to cement a footprint in the web3 community. Future updates will be announced via Twitter.

Enjoy Dracorium and all it has to offer.

also what are the eggs ?
